captions.text:
Hi guys! It's Sandi, and in today's nail art
video I'm going to be showing you how to get

the perfect glitter ombre for Prom or for
any special occasion you have coming up.

To begin, start off with a base coat to create
an even base on your nail bed. I'm using a

ridge-filling one because it gives you the
smoothest surface and it'll help prevent your
nails from chipping during your special event.

Next choose a nail polish color to match your
dress. It can be the same color as your dress,

or it could be a complimentary one. This particular
color in similar to the dress I wore when

I went to my prom. Apply two coats for a solid,
and even color.

Then give your nails about 5 minutes to completely
dry before moving onto the next step, which
is color sponging.

So to create the beautiful ombre, we are going
to use a darker shade of the same color as

our base and apply it to the corner of our
makeup sponge. I like to use porous makeup
sponges because I find it gives the best results.

Then lightly sponge it over the top 1/4 of
your nail. Concentrate the most color at the

tip of the nail and then blend whatever is
leftover on the sponge down the nail a little.

Choose a glitter polish in the same color
scheme to apply over the darker color. Move

down towards the cuticle and add a couple
strokes of falling glitter for a beautiful

gradient. Then do a second layer of glitter
just over the darker 1/4.

Finally apply a fast drying top coat to seal
in your design and add a glossy shine over
your nails.

And that's it! An easy, yet stunning design
for your big day. If you give this design

a try, then please show me using the hashtag
#cutepolish or on the new cutepolish app.

Check the description box for a free download
link.
Take care and I'll see ya next time!

title: Prom Nails: Perfect Glitter Ombre DIY!
